attributes.title: AI & Personalization, with Guy Yalif & Niels Reimer
attributes.summary: Guy Yalif performed his CH2019 keynote "AI & Personalization Demystified" and spoke about how we can use AI and machine learning, what it is (and isn't) good for in marketing and personalization. After his session, he and Niels Reimer joined me in the café to talk about this!
attributes.description:
Shownotes: cro.cafe/podcast/ai-personalizationPartners:
  • Convert: convert.com/features
  • Online Dialogue: onlinedialogue.nl
  • Braingineers: braingineers.com
 Guest 1: Guy Yalif URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/guy-yalif | Guest 2: Niels Reijmer URL: https://www.cro.cafe/guest/niels-reijmer
